kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'name=languageChoice' by label English (Indian).

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//div[contains(text(),'Invalid')]' contains text 'Invalid username or password'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

suite.doc: This suite will handle all the test case related to the invalid credentails - OEM - 102
